# indexOfSelectedItem

**Instance Property**

The index of the item that was last selected by the user.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var indexOfSelectedItem: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

If no item is selected, the value in this property is `-1`.

## Getting the user’s selection

- **selectedItem**: The menu item that was last selected by the user.
- **titleOfSelectedItem**: The title of the item that was last selected by the user.
